stimulusHtml:
1   Tunc duces principesque Nerviorum qui aliquem sermonis aditum causamque
     amicitiae cum Cicerone habebant colloqui sese velle dicunt. Facta potestate
     eadem quae Ambiorix cum Titurio egerat commemorant: omnem esse in armis
     Galliam; Germanos Rhenum transisse; Caesaris reliquorumque hiberna oppugnari.
5   Addunt etiam de Sabini morte: Ambiorigem ostentant fidei faciendae causa. Errare
     eos dicunt, si quidquam ab his praesidi sperent, qui suis rebus diffidant.

Bellum Gallicum 5.41

Answer the following questions in ENGLISH unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question.

1. To whom does sese (line 2) refer?

2. What is the direct object of commemorant (line 3) ? Write your answer in Latin.

3. Identify one and only one of the actions or circumstances that the Nervii mention in lines 3-4.

4. (A) Translate in context fidei faciendae causa (line 5) and (B) identify the case of causa.

5. What kind of genitive is praesidi (line 6) ?

6. Which of Caesarâ€™s lieutenants had previously been a victim of treachery at the hands of the Nervii?
